description: Associates a specific tag with a resource. A tag is a key-value pair that adds as a metadata to a resource. For more information, see Tagging your resources.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the given Amazon Translate resource to which you want to associate the tags.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags being associated with a specific Amazon Translate resource. There can be a maximum of 50 tags (both existing and pending) associated with a specific resource. (dict) --- A key-value pair that adds as a metadata to a resource used by Amazon Translate. The initial part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource. The second part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The initial part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The second part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.
